name: Princess King Cold Treatment
description:
The King Of Princess Snow came to the outskirts of tourism.Suddenly,began to rain and the King Of Princess Snow turn into a fallen chicken soup.After returning home,she had a cold.And now she need you to help treat.When good treatment you can also be replaced,the design of the garden.

The game features:
1.See a doctor.
2.Dress up,DIY garden.
